titles.title: O Master Let Me Walk With Thee (familiar easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Master let me walk with Thee In lowly paths of service free Tell me Thy secret Help me bear The strain of toil The fret of care{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Help me the slow of heart To move By some clear winning Word of love Teach me the wayward Feet to stay And guide them In the homeward way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach me Thy patience Still with Thee In closer dearer company In work that keeps Faith sweet and strong In trust that triumphs Over wrong{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In hope that sends A shinning ray Far down the future's Broad'ning way In peace that only Thou canst give With Thee O Master let me live{/lang-eng}
